code: import React,{useState}from'react';import ThumbUpIcon from'@mui/icons-material/ThumbUp';import ThumbDownIcon from'@mui/icons-material/ThumbDown';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Feedback=_ref=>{let{id}=_ref;const[feedbackGiven,setFeedbackGiven]=useState(false);const handleFeedback=async isCorrect=>{if(feedbackGiven)return;const resID=id;const feedback=isCorrect;try{await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/feedback',{resID:resID,feedback:feedback});setFeedbackGiven(true);alert("Feedback submitted successfully!");}catch(error){alert("Error sending feedback: ".concat(error));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feedback",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ThumbUpIcon,{className:"feedback-icon ".concat(feedbackGiven?'disabled':''),onClick:()=>handleFeedback(true),style:{cursor:feedbackGiven?'not-allowed':'pointer'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ThumbDownIcon,{className:"feedback-icon ".concat(feedbackGiven?'disabled':''),onClick:()=>handleFeedback(false),style:{cursor:feedbackGiven?'not-allowed':'pointer'}})})]});};export default Feedback;
